channel.title: My Server Please help
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is my first time i have ever made a sever and i want to know the following things.
[ul][li]how to i give sertant players gear e.g my charictor full bandos[/li] [li]How to make me a admin and what i can do as being a admin, e.g how to i use commands ect. [/li] [li]and how do i shout out announcements so everyone can hear?[/li][/ul]
Please tell me how i can do this buy useing my server files
thanks.

item.title: My Server Please help
item.dc:creator: @splosh007 splosh007
item.description:
@splosh007 wrote:

ytuio9:

the code is already found in the server you just use it with the client

ahh ok, but how do i get a list of all the commands like you used 995 wich i think is the gp. but if i wanted bandos stuff how would i pick that up…

also yeh i type

::yell messgae it does not work…

also if i wanted to edit my stats to 100 how would i do this?

Read full topic

item.title: My Server Please help
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

the code is already found in the server you just use it with the client

Read full topic

item.title: My Server Please help
item.dc:creator: @splosh007 splosh007
item.description:
@splosh007 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:2, topic:332332”]learn how to code with java.

q1: if you are an admin, you can do this command:

::pickup ID AMOUNT

what you type in is like this (example is money):


Where do i put this code? sorry...
::pickup 995 999999999

this will give you 999m of any item with an ID of 995 which is GP.

if you want to shout out announcements you should probably use ::yell, and if it is added you could use ::message for admins+[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: My Server Please help
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

learn how to code with java.

q1: if you are an admin, you can do this command:

::pickup ID AMOUNT

what you type in is like this (example is money):

::pickup 995 999999999

this will give you 999m of any item with an ID of 995 which is GP.

if you want to shout out announcements you should probably use ::yell, and if it is added you could use ::message for admins+

Read full topic

thanks.
